title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/naz_play_ball.html
notes:
A FAILURE TO COMMUNICATE



"TAKE ME OUT TO THE SCAM GAME"  starring, in order of appearance:  	 

MORGAN PATRICK, famous solicitor 	  

RAY AZMINA, player   
	
KANETH GREEN, money-man	
TONY SMITH, another money-man 	

"...O'er the land of the FREEE-E-EEE, and the hoo-o-o-oome of the
BRAAAVE!".................PLAY BALL !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

messages.subject: Next of kin
messages.body:
:		



Received: (193.70.192.97) 	


X-SenderIP: 80.88.142.36



Dear Sir/Madam,	
I, Morgan Patrick Esq. hereto as solicitor to late Engineer Martins Omar, a
Turkish national on his behalf request you to be his next of kin. Engineer
Martins Omar, a rich Oil Contractor here in Soth Africa was my client for over
15years. 	
Engineer Omar died of heart attack in Johannesburg General Hospital in South
Africa in 29th July, 1999. But before the death of my clients, he informed me
that he had a fixed deposit of ($12.5M) in a bank in South Africa for
Investment in Softwares in the future for his family. 	
I have been under pressure from the bank years after the death of my clients to
provide the particulars of his next of kin to enable them transfer the $12.5M
in his fixed deposit account to his next of kin. In this regard after un
successful attempt to locate his next of kin I seek your permission to use your
name as the next of kin to late Engineer Martins Omar to enable us claim the
funds.	
Be it as it may all the procedures to realise this transaction will be legally
done in the high court of justic by me ,all the necessary documents shall
provided to the bank by me , this include the death certificate, sworn
Affidavitte that you are the next of kin of the late Engineer Martins Omar,
statutory declaration and it is at no risk to you or the bank 
You will be asked to make an application for the payment consequently l send
the sample of the application to when you have indicated you readiness to be
part of this business Sharing 	
The funds would be shares thus;	
1. You as the Next of kin and the Account owner would be entitled to 20% of the
total funds transferred.	
2. 70%for us 	
3. 10% for our expenses.	
Send your full name and address and tel/fax to my email if you have permitted
me to use your name for this deal.You will submit your account details to the
bank when you make application for the payment.	
Thanks in anticipation.	
Morgan Patrick Esq
messages.raw:
MORGAN PATRICK:

Received: (193.70.192.97)
Date: Wed, 18 Feb 2004 01:38:49
X-SenderIP: 80.88.142.36
From: "morganpatrick" <morganpatrick@libero.it>
[scam-o-readers may remember his other unintentional guest appearances]

Subject: Next of kin

Dear Sir/Madam,
I, Morgan Patrick Esq. hereto as solicitor to late Engineer Martins Omar, a Turkish national on his behalf request you to be his next of kin. Engineer Martins Omar, a rich Oil Contractor here in Soth Africa was my client for over 15years.
Engineer Omar died of heart attack in Johannesburg General Hospital in South Africa in 29th July, 1999. But before the death of my clients, he informed me that he had a fixed deposit of ($12.5M) in a bank in South Africa for Investment in Softwares in the future for his family.
I have been under pressure from the bank years after the death of my clients to provide the particulars of his next of kin to enable them transfer the $12.5M in his fixed deposit account to his next of kin. In this regard after un successful attempt to locate his next of kin I seek your permission to use your name as the next of kin to late Engineer Martins Omar to enable us claim the funds.
Be it as it may all the procedures to realise this transaction will be legally done in the high court of justic by me ,all the necessary documents shall provided to the bank by me , this include the death certificate, sworn Affidavitte that you are the next of kin of the late Engineer Martins Omar, statutory declaration and it is at no risk to you or the bank You will be asked to make an application for the payment consequently l send the sample of the application to when you have indicated you readiness to be part of this business Sharing
The funds would be shares thus;
1. You as the Next of kin and the Account owner would be entitled to 20% of the total funds transferred.
2. 70%for us
3. 10% for our expenses.
Send your full name and address and tel/fax to my email if you have permitted me to use your name for this deal.You will submit your account details to the bank when you make application for the payment.
Thanks in anticipation.
Morgan Patrick Esq

messages.body:
:		


Morgan Patrick: 

Are you sure there is no risk to me? I have heard that the Turks can be quite
ruthless, and I sure would not like to be in their bad graces, if they find out
that I am impersonating a relative of one of their countrymen who died. 
 	
Please, tell me more. Raymond N. Azmina
messages.raw:
~sigh~ Time for a response from Ray N. Azmina...

RAY AZMINA:

Morgan Patrick: Are you sure there is no risk to me? I have heard that the Turks can be quite ruthless, and I sure would not like to be in their bad graces, if they find out that I am impersonating a relative of one of their countrymen who died.

Please, tell me more. Raymond N. Azmina

messages.body:
:

X-Originating-IP: 


Dear Raymond N. Azmina
Thank you for your mail, I know how you will feel for it is natural for any
right thinking person to feel this way if confronted with this type of offer. I
must admit that your reactions are right.
Well I want to inform you that I have been under pressure from my late client
Banker to provide the name of his next of kin to enable them transfer the
($12.5m) to his nominated Bank account. I have tried to locate the next of kin
but without success, it is in this regard that I seek your permission to use
your name as the next of kin and present it to the bank for the final transfer
of the funds into your nominated Bank account for sharing further Investment in
your country.

What is now left is an affidavit to be sworn on your behalf and other necessary
legal authorization which will be issued by the court in support of your name
as the Next of Kin of the decease before the bank will approve it. You might be
wondering how this is going to work I have already concluded the process to
this effect. 

All I need from you is your full name and address, to secure the affidavit.
Your company name telephone number/fax if any, if not your personal tel. /fax
is ok. Your Account details for this transfer

It is very pertinent to say here that trust should be our watch word in any
thing we are doing, and you have to give me your word that nothing will make
you abuse it by attempting to run away with the money at the end of the
transfer, it is by trusting ourselves that we can make the best use of this
opportunity so that at the end of this transaction we will all smile.
I want to assure you that every procedure that will be taken will be purely
legal and at no risk to you what so ever. Your percentage as the next of kin
remain as earlier stated
l shall send you a copy of the Application for payment which you will make to
the legal Department of the Bank along with copies of death certificate
Statutory Declaration and sworn Affidavit that you are the rightful next of kin
of late Engineer Marins Omar.
lam the attorney of the faminly and l represent you so you do not need another
attorney beside due to my work as a lawyer keep this to your self so that it is
not exposed I shall be grateful if you grant me this opportunity to do business
with you.

Thanks
Morgan Patric Esq

messages.body:
:	

Dear Morgan Patrick, 

I suppose it would be all right for you to do this, but I don't see how you
can, seeing as you are in Africa, and I am here in the United States. Wouldn't
I have to sign some kind of paper or something? 

Are you sure this is a safe thing for me to do? How soon before I will get my
money? 

Raymond Azmina
messages.raw:
RAY AZMINA:

Dear Morgan Patrick,

I suppose it would be all right for you to do this, but I don't see how you can, seeing as you are in Africa, and I am here in the United States. Wouldn't I have to sign some kind of paper or something?

Are you sure this is a safe thing for me to do? How soon before I will get my money?

Raymond Azmina

Thanks for your mail absolutely this transaction is 100% risk free as all the

account, it is expected that within 7 banking working days when you have made
the application the money will be transfered into your account without delay.

To your question whether you will sign some documents yes you will sign the
application for the payment before you scan and send same to the head of legal
department of the bank 

Be rest assured that you will never be into any trouble as long as this
transaction is concerned because lam the attorney in charge of this
transaction.

You can reach me on +8821652305885 for more information send the the required
information for me to commence work immediately

Thanks

Morgan Patrick Esq

messages.body:

Dear Morgan Patrick, 

I tried calling the number you provided, but all I get is a series of bleeps,
bloops, and static. Then a voice saying, "This number is not in our database." 

If that is going to keep happening, I suggest that we continue using e-mail, as
it is more reliable. 

Raymond

messages.body:
:	
Morgan Patrick: 

This is some of the information you requested: 

MY FULL NAME: Raymond Merganser Azmina ()

ADDRESS: 15775 Cromwell Avenue, Bronx, New York 10452 USA 

()

I doubt that you could get through on the telephone, as there was a huge
problem with the system last evening. I woke this morning to a news report of
telephone calamity--apparently, the new "Omicron-Ceti4" system went into
overload, and burnt out several transformers. It will be a day or two until the
Dilithium crystals are stablized. )

Fortunately, I do not rely on the telephone system for my computer, I have
satellite linkage. My ISP does not utilize FAX anyway, so there is no way to
communicate with me other than e-mail. I hope that is not too much of an
inconvenience for you. 

Let me know if there is any further information you will require. 

Raymond Azmina
messages.raw:
RAY AZMINA:

Morgan Patrick:

This is some of the information you requested:

MY FULL NAME: Raymond Merganser Azmina (naz-note: A Merganser is, of course, a duck.)

ADDRESS: 15775 Cromwell Avenue, Bronx, New York 10452 USA

(naz-note: NooYawkers should recognize this "address"--if it truly existed, it would be smack-dab in the middle of Yankee Stadium, and as near as I can figure, right behind 2nd base!)

I doubt that you could get through on the telephone, as there was a huge problem with the system last evening. I woke this morning to a news report of telephone calamity--apparently, the new "Omicron-Ceti4" system went into overload, and burnt out several transformers. It will be a day or two until the Dilithium crystals are stablized. (raynaz-note: Yeah, I'm a Trekkie)

Fortunately, I do not rely on the telephone system for my computer, I have satellite linkage. My ISP does not utilize FAX anyway, so there is no way to communicate with me other than e-mail. I hope that is not too much of an inconvenience for you.

Let me know if there is any further information you will require.

Raymond Azmina

messages.body:
:	

Morgan Patrick: 

The telephones in my area are still out, and I even went so far as to attempt
to call you from my mother's home, 50 miles from here! 

The number you provided does NOT WORK. I tried it about 20 times, and it DOES
NOT WORK!!! 
Didn't you state that you are in South Africa? That country's dialing code is
27. The number you sent begins with 88. What is the meaning of this? 

We will have to maintain our correspondence with e-mail. It's easier to
understand anyway, all the details are written down, so there is no chance to
make a mistake--and in a transaction this large, I surely wouldn't want to make
a mistake, would you? 

Raymond
messages.raw:
RAY AZMINA:

Morgan Patrick:

The telephones in my area are still out, and I even went so far as to attempt to call you from my mother's home, 50 miles from here!

The number you provided does NOT WORK. I tried it about 20 times, and it DOES NOT WORK!!!

Didn't you state that you are in South Africa? That country's dialing code is 27. The number you sent begins with 88. What is the meaning of this?

We will have to maintain our correspondence with e-mail. It's easier to understand anyway, all the details are written down, so there is no chance to make a mistake--and in a transaction this large, I surely wouldn't want to make a mistake, would you?

Raymond

messages.body:
:	

Morgan Patrick: 

I have received the documents you sent by attachment, and some of the
information is incorrect. 

You have the address as "Crownwell" Avenue, when it is "CROMWELL" Avenue. 

The name of my borough in New York is "BRONX" (spelled with only one O). Not
"Bronox" 

In this country, every detail must be correct for a business transaction to be
legal and valid, so you should amend the document to reflect the accurate
information. 

Thanks. Ray
messages.raw:

Morgan Patrick:

The name of my borough in New York is "BRONX" (spelled with only one O). Not "Bronox"

In this country, every detail must be correct for a business transaction to be legal and valid, so you should amend the document to reflect the accurate information.

Thanks. Ray

messages.body:

Morgan Patrick: 

I could send an application to the legal department of a bank, but I don't have
an address. You have failed to provide one.

I am beginning to doubt your competence. You say you are "in charge" of this
transaction, but I see only a half-hearted approach to business. 

The three documents you sent already have my information typed in, even if it
is incorrect. What more do you need? 

Raymond

messages.body:

Sir: 

I have been instructed by one Morgan Patrick to submit an application to your
bank's legal department. He has sent me some forms with my name as legal next
of kin to Martins Omar, but the street address is spelled wrong (it is not
"Crownwell", but CROMWELL), and the name of my borough in New York is BRONX,
not "BRONOX". 

These are the only forms I have from Morgan Patrick. Are they the ones you
require? I am including the Death Certificate of Martins Omar. 

Raymond Azmina
messages.raw:
Send a note to "Kaneth Green", with the three HUGE attachments... RAY AZMINA:

messages.body:
:	


Mr. Green: 

I do not have a FAX number, as my ISP does not utilize a FAX program. 

Since the Omicron-Ceti4 phone system has been repaired (apparently there was
some infestation of Tribbles, which had chewed through the insulation chambers,
and the existing DiLithium crystals had been contaminated, which caused the
outage in the first place! That's the trouble with Tribbles, they are
insatiable, and will eat nearly anything. Prolific breeders, too!) and all the
pertinent corrections have been made, I am now able to send my phone number. It
is 202-435-5031. 

I appreciate you correcting those errors in the application. I was beginning to
think that Morgan Patrick couldn't even copy information properly! He doesn't
appear to me to be the "sharpest tack in the box", if you get my drift! 

Raymond Azmina

messages.body:
:


Received: from  


Attn: Mr Raymond 

We have no intention to delay our customers funds 

Our overseas paymnet center will surely contact you for your funds 

Congratulations 

Kaneth Green (HLD)



Dear Kaneth Green: 

You wrote me on Friday that I would be contacted, and I have not heard a thing.

I am concerned that your Overseas Payment Center is delaying this transaction, 

for some reason. Can you contact them, and find out what is causing the delay? 

Thank you. Raymond Azmina

messages.body:
:	

Morgan Patrick: 

I submitted the documents to the bank, and received this from Kaneth Green: 

"...Attn: Mr Raymond 

We have no intention to delay our customers funds 

Our overseas paymnet center will surely contact you for your funds 

Congratulations 

Kaneth Green (HLD)..."

I wrote this to him on Monday:

Dear Kaneth Green: 

You wrote me on Friday that I would be contacted, and I have not heard a thing.

"...We have no intention to delay our customers funds 

Our overseas paymnet center will surely contact you for your funds..." 

I am concerned that your Overseas Payment Center is delaying this transaction, 

for some reason. Can you contact them, and find out what is causing the delay? 

Thank you. Raymond Azmina

MORGAN:

This is the status thus far. I have not seen any contact from the Overseas
Payment Center, nor have I got any mail from Kaneth Green. Do you suppose there
was some accident to his person? Perhaps he is lying in a hospital somewhere,
unable to move? I am beginning to be worried about him. Can you check on him,
please? 

Raymond
messages.raw:

Morgan Patrick:

I submitted the documents to the bank, and received this from Kaneth Green:

"...Attn: Mr Raymond We have no intention to delay our customers funds Our overseas paymnet center will surely contact you for your funds Congratulations Kaneth Green (HLD)..."

I wrote this to him on Monday:

Dear Kaneth Green:

You wrote me on Friday that I would be contacted, and I have not heard a thing. "...We have no intention to delay our customers funds

Our overseas paymnet center will surely contact you for your funds..."

I am concerned that your Overseas Payment Center is delaying this transaction, for some reason. Can you contact them, and find out what is causing the delay? Thank you. Raymond Azmina

MORGAN:

This is the status thus far. I have not seen any contact from the Overseas Payment Center, nor have I got any mail from Kaneth Green. Do you suppose there was some accident to his person? Perhaps he is lying in a hospital somewhere, unable to move? I am beginning to be worried about him. Can you check on him, please?

Raymond

messages.body:
:	

Morgan Patrick: 

Were you able to contact Kaneth Green? I have not heard anything from him or
the bank, in nearly a week! He wrote that the bank has no intention to delay
the customer's funds, and that was the last word. 

I am sure something must have happened to him. 

Raymond Azmina
messages.raw:
"The Ides of March" holds its concerns...

messages.subject: PAYMENT ADVISE
messages.body:
:	

Received: () 



SIR,
IN ACCORDANCE TO OUR AGENCY AGREEMENT WITH THE UNION BANK OF AFRICA IT IS
OUR WISH TO INFORM YOU THAT WE HAVE RECEIVED AN INSTRUCTION BACKED UP WITH
A POWER OF ATTORNEY IN YOUR FAVOUR FROM THE SAID BANK TO RECONCILE AN ACCOUNT
AND REMIT A TOTAL SUM OF US$12,5MILLION. 
WHILE WE CARRY OUT RECONCILIATION PROTOCOL, YOU ARE EXPECTED TO FORWARD THE
FOLLOWING INFORMATION TO US BY FAX:
(I) A PHOTOCOPY OF THE INFORMATION PAGE OF YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT OR
YOUR DRIVING LICENSE.
(II)A PHOTOCOPY OF YOUR DRUG CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE ISSUED BY THE BRITISH
GOVERNMENT.
(III) YOUR BANKING INFORMATION WHERE THE FUND WILL BE REMITTED.
WE SINCERELY APOLOGIZE FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE THIS MAY CAUSE YOU.
FOR FURTHER ENQUIRY, CONTACT THE UNDERSIGNED DIRECTLY ON TELEPHONE NUMBER
44 7789197125 OR FAX NUMBER 44-7887699006.
LOOKING FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU.

TONY SMITH.
messages.raw:

Subject: PAYMENT ADVISE

SIR, IN ACCORDANCE TO OUR AGENCY AGREEMENT WITH THE UNION BANK OF AFRICA IT IS OUR WISH TO INFORM YOU THAT WE HAVE RECEIVED AN INSTRUCTION BACKED UP WITH A POWER OF ATTORNEY IN YOUR FAVOUR FROM THE SAID BANK TO RECONCILE AN ACCOUNT AND REMIT A TOTAL SUM OF US$12,5MILLION.
WHILE WE CARRY OUT RECONCILIATION PROTOCOL, YOU ARE EXPECTED TO FORWARD THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION TO US BY FAX:
(I) A PHOTOCOPY OF THE INFORMATION PAGE OF YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT OR YOUR DRIVING LICENSE.
(II)A PHOTOCOPY OF YOUR DRUG CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE ISSUED BY THE BRITISH GOVERNMENT.
(III) YOUR BANKING INFORMATION WHERE THE FUND WILL BE REMITTED.
WE SINCERELY APOLOGIZE FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE THIS MAY CAUSE YOU.
FOR FURTHER ENQUIRY, CONTACT THE UNDERSIGNED DIRECTLY ON TELEPHONE NUMBER 44 7789197125 OR FAX NUMBER 44-7887699006.
LOOKING FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU.

TONY SMITH.

messages.body:
:	

Sir: 

You ask for a copy of my information page of my passport. I will not do this.
Identity theft is a major problem these days, and I will give a copy of such
sensitive information to NO ONE ! Do not even begin to ask for such a thing
again. If you require a photo ID, I will be happy to provide suitable
identification to you. 

Where do you think I will get such an item as a "drug clearance certificate"
from the BRITISH GOVERNMENT? The British Government will not give clearance to
me, I am not a British citizen, I've never been to Britain, and I won't even be
IN Britain! Where do you think I will get such a thing, from a box of corn
flakes? What a STUPID request. 

My banking information is thus: 

NAME: Raymond Merganser Azmina 

ADDRESS: 15775 Cromwell Avenue, Bronx, New York 10452 

AGE/DATE OF BIRTH: 52 -- 30 June, 1954 

BIRTHPLACE: Pine Valley, Pennsylvania, USA 

MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME: Marie Antoinette Callender 

BANK: Cromwell Avenue Federated Bank 

ADDRESS OF BANK: 16292 Cromwell Avenue, Bronx, New York 10457 

ACCOUNT NUMBER: 506-3338-28293 SWIFT CODE: 10-S-N-E-1 

NAME ON ACCOUNT: RAY'S Chop Shop 

If you need further information, feel free to ask 

Raymond M. Azmina
messages.raw:
RAY AZMINA:

Sir:

You ask for a copy of my information page of my passport. I will not do this. Identity theft is a major problem these days, and I will give a copy of such sensitive information to NO ONE ! Do not even begin to ask for such a thing again. If you require a photo ID, I will be happy to provide suitable identification to you.

Where do you think I will get such an item as a "drug clearance certificate" from the BRITISH GOVERNMENT? The British Government will not give clearance to me, I am not a British citizen, I've never been to Britain, and I won't even be IN Britain! Where do you think I will get such a thing, from a box of corn flakes? What a STUPID request.

My banking information is thus:

NAME: Raymond Merganser Azmina
ADDRESS: 15775 Cromwell Avenue, Bronx, New York 10452
AGE/DATE OF BIRTH: 52 -- 30 June, 1954
BIRTHPLACE: Pine Valley, Pennsylvania, USA
MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME: Marie Antoinette Callender

ACCOUNT NUMBER: 506-3338-28293 SWIFT CODE: 10-S-N-E-1
NAME ON ACCOUNT: RAY'S Chop Shop

If you need further information, feel free to ask

Raymond M. Azmina

:	

Morgan Patrick: 

You string me along for 4 weeks, then tell me you are dealing with another
person? 

What kind of person would have so little integrity, and honor? I thought you
consider 

me your partner, and now this rude note! 

Raymond Azmina
